ModMetaData.name: ESCP - Imperial
ModMetaData.author: Rick, SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in the Imperials using Humanoid Alien Race Framework. Imperials are a human race found nearly everywhere, Imperials are a cosmopolitan and domineering people. While they look extremely average in terms of other humans, they posess superlative powers of speech and persuasion, giving them many allies to draw from for both trade and battle. Those they cannot persuade tend to succumb to their considerable military prowess, and become part of their Empire by force, with few exceptions. Their faith in the Empire makes Imperials particularly mentally hardy and resistant to breaks, and the breadth of their cultural experience makes them especially effective negotiators and traders. However they tend to be more lacking in certain other basic skills for survival..

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded
-Requires Harmony
-Requires Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
